ygData.subject: Re: Ok everyone, WAKE UP
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone found a Hilt that was identified as the Hilt of Soulfire.  We now believe we must find all the parts of Soulfire and combine them (with help possibly)
ygData.messageBody:
Someone found a Hilt that was identified as the Hilt of Soulfire. We now believe
we must find all the parts of Soulfire and combine them (with help possibly) to
get the sword. The hilt was found in Mistmore off of a high level Shadow Knight
(Troll I think). He was 40-45th or so.

Dan Kassiday wrote:

> From: "Dan Kassiday" <kassiday@...>
>
> How did you find out that the hilt is on a SK in mistmoore?
>
> last time I fooled with the quest Grohbah sent me to Pietro Zarn who
> is the SK guildmaster under Freeport. I did not think it prudent to
> approach him as a level 10 paladin.
>
> From: "CybrWzrd" <CybrWzrd@...>
> To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
> Date sent: Mon, 28 Jun 1999 13:23:32 -0500
> Send reply to: eqpaladin@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqpaladin] Ok everyone, WAKE UP
>
> > From: "CybrWzrd" <CybrWzrd@...>
> >
> > This newsgroup has been kind of slow lately, and I am wondering what
> > everyones thoughts on geting ghoulsbane are, because you do have to kill a
> > fellow paladin to get it. Also has anyone here found any other piecec of
> > soulfire other than the hilt that is on the shadowknight in Mistmoore? Just
> > a few new topics to hopefully breathe some life into this group.
> >
> > Lady Dame Laurana Highwind
